atAGlanceFacts.factValue: Baseboard, Forced air, Electric, Oil, Propane / Butane

data.description: 2 Two car garages, one attached to home and one on road. Large Barn is included in this property. There are horse stalls and plenty of storage. Below the barn is plenty of room for other animals. Property has a hand made fence around property, with automated gate, as well as other gates.  Property has stone walls built by present owner around pond and other parts of property. New septic was installed in August of 2009.
